desc: Handcrafted in small batches, each soap is beautiful, smells wonderful, and feels silky on your face, skin, and body. Each bar is unique, elegant, and made by an artisan with a special story to share. These make lovely gifts for men, women, and children alike. Local pick-up, delivery, and shipping, are available.

layout.text:
Handcrafted Artisan Soap
Small Batch
Vegan
Fragrant
Luxurious
